inputs.selection_motivation: Euribor, as the eurozone interbank rate, directly influences borrowing costs and credit conditions, which are key drivers of inflation expectations and actual price movements in the Euro Area.
inputs.candidate_motivation: Euribor is the euro-area benchmark rate that is directly shaped by ECB policy and inflation dynamics; its movements also correlate with euro currency factors and global funding conditions, including rate expectations reflected in EURUSD and U.S. inflation/yields.

proposed_link.motivation: Euribor, as the eurozone interbank rate, directly influences borrowing costs and credit conditions, which are key drivers of inflation expectations and actual price movements in the Euro Area.
